text: 6.12: Zo 12.31; 14.30; Ro 8.38; 1 Ko 15.50; Kor 2.15; 1 Pi 5.8-9Nde tuituigira ndɨkndɨgɨri. Nza gumgi gu mbigi phorga shogi fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Nza ŋiniŋgi ŋkasŋkagi phorga shogav, kha nuianan ŋiniŋgir pani phorga shogav, mbarkɨrga ŋkasŋkagi ki bigi phorga shogi. Nta ntigem kha tuga gɨngɨnan kav, kha nuiana gari. Nza vhɨra kha vun ki ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi phorga shogi.
